properties.areaDesc: South Central Oregon Coast; Curry County Coast
properties.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 28 at 5:54PM PST until January 30 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Large breaking waves of 21 to 23 feet.

* WHERE...South Central Oregon Coast and Curry County Coast.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to noon PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Large breaking waves will create hazardous conditions
along and within the surf zone, and could inundate beaches and
low lying shorelines. Beach erosion is possible, and exposed
infrastructure may be damaged. There will also be an increased
chance of sneaker waves early Thursday morning.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Stay away from the surf zone and off of jetties. Area beaches may
become hazardous due to dangerous surf conditions.

NWSheadline: HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO NOON PST THURSDAY... ...INCREASED CHANCE OF SNEAKER WAVES EARLY THURSDAY MORNING
